text: Radharaman Dutta was an influential Bengali musician and poet. == Notable famous songs by Radharaman == * Shyam Kalia Shuna Bondhu Re * Bhromor Koio Giya * Kare Dhekabo Moner Dhukko Go * Sham Chikon Kalia * Bolo Go Bolo Go Shoki * Mone Nai Mone Nai * Jole Jaio Na Go Rai * O Bashi Re * Sham Na Ki Choli la * Jole Gia Chilam Shoi * Ami Robo Na Robo Na Grihe * Kalay Pran Ti Nilo (Bashi Ti Bajaiya) * Amar Bondhu Doyamoy * Jugol Milon Hoilo Go * Pap Ar Punno, Kori Tare Manno * Ke Tore Shikhailo Radhar Namti Re * Amar Golar Har Khule Ne Ogo Lalite * Amare Ashibar Kotha Koiya == References == Category:1833 births Category:1915 deaths Category:Musicians Category:Singers Category:Lyricists
title: Radharaman Dutta
